data.name: That Golf Game
data.detailed_description:
Casual player? Just keep it simple!

But more advanced golfers will enjoy the ability to fine-tune their shots. Use skill points to upgrade your golfer's power, spin, shot shaping, and more!

                         

Gain the ability to fade or draw your ball around obstacles. Play a low, bounding shot if it's windy. Loft it high and spin it back. Or pitch the ball with extra spin and stop it on a dime!

Get in the hole!



If you're like us you've been disappointed with the "feel" of most golf games, especially the putting. We've worked hard on That Golf Game's mechanics, because we want it to feel "right". It should feel solid and satisfying to drop that 15 foot birdie putt!

                                

Different strokes for different folks!



Take your time, relax, and just play the shots. Play solo, or go head-to-head vs. the CPU or friends in local multiplayer. Compete in tournaments, stroke play, match play, skins, best ball, scramble, and more...

Challenge yourself with approach shot, putting, and chipping contests.

Or drive your cart from shot to shot - in timed modes, or with no timer at all... just you against the course!

                

Win medals by scoring pars and birdies before the clock runs out. Drive, run, swim... and launch yourself to cover ground more quickly!

                   

Bombs away!



Pesky tree in your way? No problem! Hit around it with a fade or draw. Or turn that tree into kindling with Bomb Mode!

                         

Gopher the gold!



Gophers are an optional hazard. They'll tear up those greens, forcing you to plan your approach shots more carefully. And sometimes you'll have to ditch your putter and chip over those gopher burrows!

                                             

Zombie mode is also optional. Play your shots with precision, to keep your ball away from randomly placed zombie clusters.

Hit it too close and you'll have to fend them off before your next shot... or try a "Quick Shot" to get out of there as fast as possible, but at the cost of accuracy! Then again, you could always chip a bomb into their midst to clear 'em out, lickety-split!

                        

Build-a-Golfer



Customize your golfer's look, with options including glasses, piercings, and facial hair. Click the "Randomize Face" button, or tweak your golfer's features with dozens of settings.

data.short_description: A light-hearted golf game with a focus on fun! Take your time and just play the shots - in tournaments, stroke play, match play, and more... Or drive your cart from shot to shot, cruising along at your own pace, or racing against the clock!
